common.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

metadata.siteDescription: Search Indonesian laws, government regulations, presidential decrees, and more. Full text structured by article and clause. Free and open source.
metadata.ogDescription: Search Indonesian laws, government regulations, presidential decrees, and more. Free and open source.
metadata.ogImageAlt: Pasal.id: Search Indonesian law with ease

hero.heading: Find the legal article you need

search.title: Search Regulations
search.noQuery: Enter a keyword to search Indonesian regulations.
search.noResultsSuggestion: Try different keywords or check your spelling.
search.errorMessage: An error occurred while searching. Please try again.
search.emptyState: Enter a keyword or select a filter to search Indonesian regulations
search.changeFilters: Try changing the filters or add a search keyword.

reader.readFullText: Read the full text of {ref} regarding {title}.
reader.noContentYet: Article content is not yet available for this regulation.

verification.unverifiedReason1: This data was automatically processed by our parser from the official PDF.
verification.unverifiedReason2: It has not been reviewed by a human to ensure 100% accuracy.
verification.unverifiedReason3: We are gradually verifying the data.

disclaimer.text: This content is not legal advice. Always refer to official sources for legal certainty.
disclaimer.legalContentNotice: Legal documents are displayed in Bahasa Indonesia, their official language of publication.

regulationType.PERPPU: Government Regulation in Lieu of Law
regulationType.PERMENKUMHAM: Minister of Law and Human Rights Regulation

browse.title: Browse Regulations
browse.noRegulationsYet: No regulations in the database yet.
browse.typePageDescription: List of {type} in Indonesia's legal database.

trust.item1Detail: Collected from official state publications and the national legal documentation network.
trust.item2Detail: Chapters, articles, and clauses are individually searchable. No need to read entire documents.
trust.item3Detail: Source code is open and verifiable. Compare directly with official sources.

connect.title: Connect Claude
connect.description: Use Pasal.id as an MCP server for Claude
connect.pageDescription: Give Claude direct access to Indonesian law through Model Context Protocol (MCP). No hallucination, with real citations.
connect.heroTagline: Give Claude direct access to Indonesian law, no hallucination, with real citations.
connect.claudeCodeInstructions: Run this command in Claude Code terminal:
connect.claudeDesktopInstructions: Add the following configuration to your {config} file:
connect.claudeDesktopHint: Open Claude Desktop, go to Settings → Developer → Edit Config, then paste the configuration above.
connect.demoDescription: Auto demo: Claude uses 4 Pasal.id tools to answer legal questions with accurate citations.
connect.step1Description: Ask Claude anything about Indonesian law, in everyday language.
connect.step2Description: Claude automatically calls Pasal.id to search for relevant regulations.
connect.step3Description: The system returns the original article text along with metadata and legal status.
connect.step4Description: Claude answers your question by citing directly from official legal sources.
connect.toolsDescription: Four MCP tools Claude can use to access the Indonesian legal database.
connect.tool1Detail: Full-text search with Indonesian language stemmer. Supports filtering by regulation type and year.
connect.tool2Detail: Get the full content of a single article and its clauses from a specific law.
connect.tool3Description: Check if a law is still in force
connect.tool3Detail: Check legal status: in force, amended, or revoked, along with amendment history.
connect.tool4Detail: View all available regulations, with type filtering and pagination.
connect.examplePrompt1: Explain Article 81 of the Job Creation Law on employment
connect.examplePrompt2: Is the 1974 Marriage Law still in force?
connect.examplePrompt3: What are contract workers' rights under Indonesian law?
connect.examplePrompt4: What is the minimum marriage age in Indonesia?
connect.examplePrompt5: Compare worker rights before and after the Job Creation Law
connect.whatIsMcpParagraph1: Model Context Protocol (MCP) is an open standard that allows AI like Claude to securely access external data.
connect.whatIsMcpParagraph2: With MCP, Claude can search laws, read specific articles, and check legal status, directly from the Pasal.id database.

correction.reasonPlaceholder: Example: Typo in clause (2), wrong capitalization
correction.successMessage: Thank you! Your suggestion will be reviewed by the admin team.
correction.errorRateLimit: Too many suggestions. Try again later (max 10/hour).
correction.errorStaleContent: The text has been updated by someone else. Reload the page to see the latest version.
correction.errorNetwork: Failed to submit suggestion. Check your internet connection.

topics.pageDescription: Legal guides based on everyday life topics.

apiDocs.pageDescription: Pasal.id public API for accessing Indonesian legal data. Free, no authentication, CORS enabled.
apiDocs.searchDesc: Search regulations by keyword. Uses full-text search with automatic fallback.
apiDocs.searchParamType: Filter by regulation type (see codes below)
apiDocs.lawsDesc: List regulations with type, year, and status filters. Supports pagination.
apiDocs.lawsParamType: Filter by regulation type (see codes below)
apiDocs.lawsParamStatus: Filter by status: berlaku, dicabut, or diubah
apiDocs.lawDetailDesc: Full detail of a regulation: metadata, list of articles with content, and relationships to other regulations.
apiDocs.regulationTypeCodesHint: Use the following codes for the type parameter in /search and /laws endpoints. Not case-sensitive.
apiDocs.statusValuesHint: Use with the status parameter in the /laws endpoint.
apiDocs.quickStartDetail: Detail of Law 13/2003 (Employment) with all articles
apiDocs.rateLimitIntro: This API is free and open to all. To maintain service quality, we apply the following limits:
apiDocs.rateLimitExceeded: Requests exceeding the limit will receive a 429 Too Many Requests response.
apiDocs.needHigherLimitsDesc: If you're building an application that needs more access, we're happy to help. Contact us to discuss your needs, including custom API keys and higher limits.
apiDocs.mcpNote: For AI integration, use our <link>MCP Server</link>, direct access from Claude without writing code.

footer.disclaimer: This content is not legal advice. Always refer to official sources for legal certainty.
